author: schneiml
body:
#### PR description:

In some harvesting workflows, `DQMEventInfo` is run to record the current run number etc. in the DQM output. This is not really legal, since `DQMEventInfo` is a `DQMEDAnalyzer` and not supposed to run in harvesting. 

While this worked by coincidence in the past, in #28622 such modules' output is no longer written to file. To fix this, I added a new module that is based on `DQMEDHarvester` which only records the values which make sense in harvesting.

On request of @mmusich , who wanted to have this functionality preserved for AlCa harvesting jobs.

I changed a few configurations where it is rather obvious that `DQMEventInfo` was used in harvesting, however, that list might be not complete.

#### PR validation:

Runs wf 1001, where the issue was spotted. Some configuration files changed here might not be tested in the PR tests.
title: DQM: New EventInfo module for Harvesting
